name: Matching time in words and digital clocks (12 hour only)

skills.name: Tell the time from a 12 hour digital clock with times before half past the hour
Tell the time from a 12 hour digital clock with times after half past the hour

explanations.A: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past would be 9:15. This time has nine hours and no extra minutes.
explanations.B: This time has nine hours and no extra minutes, so it is 9 o' clock.
explanations.C: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter to 9 would be 15 minutes before 9, or 8:45. This time has nine hours and no extra minutes.
explanations.D: Half of an hour is 30 minutes, so half past would be 9:30. This time has nine hours and no extra minutes.

explanations.A: The time on the clock has nine hours and 15 minutes. 15 minutes is a quarter of an hour, so it is quarter past nine.
explanations.B: Nine o' clock would be shown as 9:00 on a digital clock. But this clock shows 9:15 which is 9 hours and 15 minutes. Remember that 15 minutes is a quarter of an hour.
explanations.C: Not quite. 15 minutes is a quarter of an hour, but quarter to 9 would be 15 minutes before 9, or 8:45. The time on this clock has nine hours and 15 extra minutes.
explanations.D: Half of an hour is 30 minutes, so half past would be 9:30. This time has nine hours and 15 extra minutes.

explanations.A: Almost, but "to seven" means it is not seven o'clock yet. 7:45 is after 7 o'clock, so it is quarter to the next hour.
explanations.B: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 7 would be 7:15. 7:45 is 15 minutes before the next hour.
explanations.C: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes,. 7:45 is 15 minutes before 8 o'clock, so it is quarter to 8.
explanations.D: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 8 would be 8:15. 7:45 is 15 minutes before the next hour.

explanations.A: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 4 would be 4:15. Instead, 4:45 is 15 minutes before the next hour.
explanations.B: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 5 would be 5:15. Instead, 4:45 is 15 minutes before 5.
explanations.C: Almost, but "to four" means it is not four o'clock yet. 4:45 is after 4 o'clock, so it is quarter to the next hour.
explanations.D: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes. 4:45 is 15 minutes before 5 o'clock, so it is quarter to 5.

explanations.A: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 2 would be 2:15. How many minutes past 2 is shown on the clock?
explanations.B: This time shows 20 minutes after 2 o'clock. We can say this as two twenty.
explanations.C: "to two" means before two o'clock. This time is after 2 o'clock. How many minutes after 2 is shown on the clock?
explanations.D: When we say a time, we need to say the hour and the minutes separately.

explanations.A: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 3 would be 3:15. How many minutes past 3 is shown on the clock?
explanations.B: Half an hour is 30 minutes, so half past 3 would be 3:30. How many minutes past 3 is shown on the clock?
explanations.C: This time shows 25 minutes after 3 o'clock. We can say this as "three twenty-five".
explanations.D: to three means before three o'clock. The time on the clock is after 3 o'clock. How many minutes after 3 is it?

explanations.A: 15 minutes is only quarter of an hour. Which one of these times shows half an hour after 7 o'clock?
explanations.B: 45 minutes is three quarters of an hour. Which one of these times shows half an hour after 7 o'clock?
explanations.C: Not quite - remember an hour is 60 minutes, not 100 minutes. So which of these times shows half an hour?
explanations.D: Half an hour is 30 minutes, so half past 7 is 30 minutes after 7 o'clock, or 7:30.

explanations.A: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 7 is 7:15.
explanations.B: Not quite. Quarter past seven means 15 minutes past 7. But 7.45 would be quarter to 8. Which clock shows 15 minutes after 7 o'clock?
explanations.C: Remember that there are 60 minutes in an hour so quarter of an hour = 15 minutes. Which clock shows 15 minutes after 7 o'clock?
explanations.D: I think you might have confused "quarter past" and "half past". Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, Which clock shows 15 minutes after 7 o'clock?

explanations.A: Not quite - a quarter can be written as 1/4, but that doesn't mean it is 4 minutes. A whole hour is 60 minutes. Half an hour is 30 minutes. How many minutes in a quarter of an hour?
explanations.B: Not quite - remember an hour is 60 minutes, not 100 minutes. So which of these times shows quarter of an hour?
explanations.C: Quarter of an hour is 15 minutes, so quarter past 10 is 15 minutes after 10 o'clock, or 10:15.
explanations.D: I think you have mixed up hours and minutes - the hours come first in digital time. Also, think about how many minutes in a quarter of an hour, if there are 60 minutes in a whole hour and 30 in half an hour...

explanations.A: I think you've mixed up the hours and minutes. Ten past four is 10 minutes after 4 o'clock. Remember that the hour is first (on the left) on a digital display.
explanations.B: Ten past four is 10 minutes after 4 o'clock, or 4:10.
explanations.C: 4:50 is fifty minutes past 4 o'clock or 10 minutes before 5 o'clock. We want to find "ten past 4" which is 10 minutes after 4 o'clock.
explanations.D: 3:50 is fifty minutes past 3 o'clock or 10 minutes before 4 o'clock. We want to find "ten past 4" which is 10 minutes after 4 o'clock.
